effect.name: Rectangle Inner Border
effect.description: Adds a border with custom (pixel) size to the object. Object size must be specified.
effect.author: Original by bybyblue, Edit and DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Object Width
parameter.description: Width of the object the shader is applied to.

parameter.name: Object Height
parameter.description: Height of the object the shader is applied to.

parameter.name: Border Size
parameter.description: Size of the border for the rectangle around the object (it's based on the defined object size).
